entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7 except minus 1 near the Alberta border. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or rain showers. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7 except minus 1 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 3 except plus 2 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3 except plus 2 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:19 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 6:19 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
